# Select

```{r}
library(nycflights13)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
flights
```



```{r select-1}
select(flights, year, month, day)
```

```{r select-everything}

select(flights, time_hour, air_time, everything())

```

```{r select-match}

select(flights, ends_with("time"))

```
